txt.en: 'Mazog remains a dangerous foe, even in captivity. We will meet the dwarves escorting Mazog once we make the crossing of Anduin; they will not let down their guard, and neither should we. I am certain Mazog will try to escape, or worse, at some point on the journey.\n\n'I wonder if that is our real peril, or if it will be keeping Achardor from slaying him once it happens?'
What can we expect from Mazog?
